mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (reply_num,board_num, rcontent, user_num) VALUES (reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{board_num}, #{rcontent}, #{user_num})
mapper.select: SELECT reply_num,board_num,rcontent,user_num, user_name, r.rdate FROM ReplyVO r,users m WHERE r.usernum = m.nickname AND board_num=#{board_num} ORDER BY reply_num
